item.title: Jackie Chan’s ‘The Shadow’s Edge’ Rises to No. 1 at China Box Office
item.description: iQiYi Pictures’ thriller “The Shadow’s Edge” climbed to the top of the Chinese box office in its second weekend with RMB182.9 million ($25.4 million), according to Artisan Gateway. The Larry Yang–dire
